changeSet.author: Venky

changeSet.author: Venky

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("TPF (Carboplatin/Paclitaxel/5FU)","TPF (Cisplatin/Paclitaxel/5FU)","TPF (Carboplatin/Docetaxel/5FU)","TPF (Cisplatin/Docetaxel/5FU)","GC (Carboplatin/Gemcitabin)","TP (Carboplatin/Paclitaxel)","TP (Cisplatin/Paclitaxel)","TP (Carboplatin/Docetaxel)","TP (Cisplatin/Docetaxel)","TIP (Paclitaxel/ Ifosfamide/Cisplatin)","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CCAT, Chemotherapy regimen");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to CCAT, Chemotherapy regimen

changeSet.author: Venky
